mapper.sql: id, national_id, name, prop_name, referrer_id, friend_id, group_account_id, branch_id
mapper.update: update public.client set national_id = #{nationalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prop_name = #{propName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, referrer_id = #{referrerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, friend_id = #{friendId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, group_account_id = #{groupAccountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, branch_id = #{branchId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
